title: LineagePropagationAction
description: Propagate description, tags and glossary terms via lineage

propagateDomain.title: Propagate Domain
propagateDomain.description: Propagate domain from the parent through lineage

propagateColumnLevel.title: Propagate Column Level
propagateColumnLevel.description: Propagate the metadata to columns via column-level lineage.

propagateParent.title: Propagate Parent
propagateParent.description: Propagate the metadata to the parents (e.g., tables) via lineage.

overwriteMetadata.title: Overwrite Metadata
overwriteMetadata.description: Update descriptions, tags and Glossary Terms via lineage even if they are already defined in the asset. By default, descriptions are only updated if they are not already defined in the asset, and incoming tags are merged with the existing ones.

propagationStopConfigs.title: Propagation Stop Configurations
propagationStopConfigs.description: List of configurations to stop propagation based on conditions
